author: dlr
msg: Made it safe to call setConfiguration(ExtendedProperties) with the
same instance of EP which is already in use.
Now, since setConfiguration() is the external interface for setting
the configuration member, perhaps a warning should be logged in such a
situation.  Also, it's arguable that EP itself should be changed.

msg: Whitespace clean up -- no functional changes.

author: dlr
msg: Fixed problem pointed out by Jon Stevens <jon@collab.net> where the
wrong ResourceLoader name was being used for logging in initLoader().
